about.description: Library to convert Draft.js ContentState to HTML
about.summary: Library to convert rich text from Draft.js raw ContentState to HTML

about.description: Library to convert Draft.js ContentState to HTML
about.summary: Library to convert rich text from Draft.js raw ContentState to HTML

name: draftjs_exporter
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "draftjs_exporter" %}
{% set version = "5.0.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/draftjs_exporter-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 2efee45d4bb4c0aaacc3e5ea2983a29a29381e02037f3f92a6b12706d7b87e1e

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.8
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.8

test:
  imports:
    - draftjs_exporter
    - draftjs_exporter.engines
    - draftjs_exporter.utils
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
## Required for running the tests.
#    - pytest ==7.4.3
#    - pytest-cov ==4.1.0
#    - pytest-memray ==1.5.0
#    - tox ==4.11.4
#    - python-build ==1.0.3
#    - setuptools ==69.0.3
## HTML builders.
## Keep this in sync with the dependencies in setup.py, requirements.txt, tox.ini.
#    - lxml >=4.2.0,<5
#    - beautifulsoup4 >=4.4.1,<5
#    - html5lib >=0.999,<2
## Benchmark dependencies.
#    - markov_draftjs ==0.2.0
#    - memray ==1.11.0
#    - psutil ==5.9.7
#    #- memory_profiler ==0.47
#    #- coverage >=4.1.0
#    #- flake8 >=3.2.0
#    #- isort ==4.2.5
## For linting and formatting.
#    - ruff ==0.1.9
#    - mypy ==1.8.0

about:
  home: https://github.com/springload/draftjs_exporter
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Library to convert rich text from Draft.js raw ContentState to HTML
  description: 
    Library to convert Draft.js ContentState to HTML
  doc_url: https://github.com/springload/draftjs_exporter
  dev_url: https://github.com/springload/draftjs_exporter

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - cshaley
    - rxm7706
    - sannykr
